website_summaries.verdict: A good-quality piece with ample basic features.
pros: Light, durable material keeps the feel of the mattress and blocks allergens
Good-quality elastic keeps it in place

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mattress pad!! It fits my king size memory foam mattress perfectly, it doesn't come off the corners like the other mattress pads. It has withstood many washes thru the washing machine and dryer, with no visible differences. And I can attest to the fact that it does block spills from even coming close to the mattress...it blocks them completely. I was a little concerned about spending the money on this cover, it is the most I have ever spent on a mattress pad but it was so worth it and I would buy another one in a heartbeat if I needed a new one!!
customer_reviews.author: Gay Rall

customer_reviews.title: Great, great, great!!
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best mattress protector cover I've owned in the past five years! I've had to purchase new covers twice a year bc they fall apart, don't block water, shrink, etc. It's been a challenge finding this cover. I went to department stores, outlet stores and online. I finally came back to my trusted Amazon and decided on this one and I'm happy with it. I wash according to the instructions and it still fits and prevents water leakage, very important when you have little kids and dogs! It's also quiet, while in use; for anyone wondering. It's not like one of those covers that sound like scrunched plastic beneath you. If you're looking for a cover, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Well if you ask me...

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work. not waterproof. False peace of mind. Ruined bed.
customer_reviews.text: Dog peed on this, and I came home from a trip to find a giant puddle of pee had soaked right through and penetrated our gorgeous soft luxurious organic mattress. Now our bed smells like pee. A giant puddle of pee. This seemed to work at first but i think it eventually let’s the liquid through if the liquid is not instantly removed. It is not waterproof. There are actually small pee stains all over our bed now that I take a closer look. If your dog is aging and you may not be there to catch it instantly, this is not a worry free solution.
customer_reviews.author: dingleberry

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality for the price! Purchased because I'm 9 mths pregnant and don't want a ruined mattress if my water breaks or the new baby has an accident. After taking it out of the package I have serious concerns it isn't all that liquid proof, and if it were, I can't imagine it would ever survive being washed without ripping to shreds because it's paper thin. Also the terry cloth is incredibly rough. Doesnt even seem pleasant to sleep on, returned it. Paid $30 for this thing bought a fluffy serta mattress pad on sale for $35, save your money and look for a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Devan K

customer_reviews.title: Love this matress protector
customer_reviews.text: Love this matress protector. I actually bought three.the material is soft and confortable and it does not make any annoying noise!It fits perfectly all of my beds. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Platinum Check Card

customer_reviews.title: Worst protector. Doesn't work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. My friend has this and it works great for her, maybe they started using a different material because mine does not work at all. I now have 2 stains on brand new mattress from this product not working. I did not let any liquid sit on, changed as soon as my child had an accident and the second time was spit up. Neither time did item stop any liquid from getting through.
customer_reviews.author: mary hill

customer_reviews.title: Good idea if you have kids or dogs!  Or drink in bed!
customer_reviews.text: These work fairly well. Our previous waterproof mattress protector lasted about 10 years (and a handful of washings) before the lining broke down and stopped acting as a barrier. Had an angry dog pee on the bed once, and this kept the mess on top where it could be removed and the bedding washed. Nothing made it down to the mattress! It's latex (or something similar) covered woven fabric, not plastic sheeting, so it's not hot and sweaty (ours is UNDER a mattress pad and the sheets anyway). This one seems to be of comparable quality to the one it replaced. Fits a deep mattress (ours is 15" with an extra 3-4" of foam toppers).
customer_reviews.author: S. Grabhorn

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality & Value
customer_reviews.text: I have a dozen of these covers in full, queen and king size. I have had first one for 18 mos and change/wash weekly. I have 2 and swap out. The other one I paid $100 for from the mattress vendor. If any stains or issues, warranty voided. But these work as well as the expensive pads. I need the bed cool and have a cooling mattress. This isn't bad for the money. I will admit the $100 one is cooler but that's by design. And not really worth the extra $60+. I will continue to purchase when I need covers as long as they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Scaz

customer_reviews.title: It did its job perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and not crunchy! Fine terrycloth like covering over the thin impervious layer. You definitely do not feel like you are sleeping on a shower curtain! I am usually very warm at night and I have not woken up sweaty due to this protector. The corners are nice & deep if you have a larger mattress or a pillow top. UPDATE!!!!... It did its job perfectly! 2 days after purchasing we had a pet accident that soaked the sheets but NOT the mattress! I will be ordering another one for back-up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ktsbelle

customer_reviews.title: THIN
customer_reviews.text: So so thin !! As soon as I removed this pad from it's package, I just couldn't believe how thin it was. I have very expensive mattresses so I did not want to take a chance so I bought one from RH and that one think and felt like real quality so I just put the both of them on all the beds. I cannot say how good it works, but I can tell you how thin it is and I did not want to take the chance on the expensive mattresses I have in my home.
customer_reviews.author: kim gloria

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to protect my Lucid foam topper I put on my mattress. I know you don't have to cover your foam topper but I wanted to protect it since it didn't have a cover. This works great. Thin, waterproof and will keep my topper clean. I washed and dryed it before putting on my bed with no problems. It fit my deep mattress with a 3" topper on it. I will say I am also not waking up hot now and I was every night with just the topper. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Ga Girl

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations but functional
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover seems to indeed be waterproof and durable however it did not feel very soft under the sheet. In fact it had a clinical feel to me. It crinkled and made plastic noises when you moved and ran your hands along it. Terry cloth top almost felt spiked through sheets to me. Had to return. Might be good for a guest room or rental property but wasn't what I was looking for for my home bed.
customer_reviews.author: dk2222

customer_reviews.title: protects new mattresses consistently
customer_reviews.text: I have these in all of my vacation rentals protecting the mattresses. They are waterproof and wash/dry well. I've gone through several over the year but they take on a lot of spills and stains before getting too discolored for use. I've never thrown them out because it ripped or fell apart, only discoloration after many, many stains and bleaching. It's well worth the price in protecting your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: retired teacher

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: It works, and that’s what I need it to do. We don’t co-sleep with our kids, but the odd nightmare or sickness will bring them to our bed. My littelest’s diaper shifted whilst sleeping next to me just this morning and pee covered angood portion of the cover. Our very expensive mattress underneath stayed perfectly dry. It does ever so slightly change the feel of the bed, but not significantly enough to take it off. It protects from liquid, sweat, etc., getting through to the mattress and it’s not hot or uncomfortable in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Dannygirl

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: It is actually a big plastic cover inside with a towel fabric on the outside part. It is extremely noisy and looks very cheap. Cannot imagine how bad it would be to actually try to sleep over this cover! But I didn't even get to test it on my bed. Mine arrived with a seam line ripped already. Returning it to seller. Very disappointed. Bought because I owe a folding mattress from Lucid and we loved the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it doesn't even seem like the same product being offered today
customer_reviews.text: It is not waterproof! We have a stained mattress as a result. And mine is not a terrycloth top, it is smooth. I bought it in May 2016, and it doesn't even seem like the same product being offered today.
customer_reviews.author: Jes380

customer_reviews.title: Basically a plastic bag with cheap and thin terry cloth on the outer side....
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed in this product taking it out of the packaging. I washed it thinking I could live with it but the was thick plastic and made that horrible plastic rubbing sound and the terry cloth on the outer side? Thing and cheap. I immediately balled it up and threw it in a bag and dropped it off at Goodwill. I ended up settling for one that was basically the same exact price from Marshall's, Homegoods or TJ Maxx. This is one of the products that's probably best to purchase at a store to avoid the disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Heather

customer_reviews.title: Machine washable and machine DRYABLE!
customer_reviews.text: It's machine washable and machine dryable, which are the two most important features I wanted in a waterproof mattress cover. I have another one that isn't machine dryable, so I can only wash it in warm weather. Climate change may be making the planet warmer, but I still can't hang my old cover out every time it's washed, and how many people have a place to hang king-sized bedding inside? It perfectly protects our expensive mattress, even from occasional wet pets (sometimes I really regret the cat flap, LOL). The only drawback I can find is that it's a bit loose on our (king-size) mattress and tends to bunch up under the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: GreenWeaver

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 5 stars because it is exactly as listed. I personally don’t like the product but not because it isn’t what I ordered. It is thin and easy to put on your bed. It doesn’t move around much and fits well on my king mattress. There are no weird smells and doesn’t make a plastic sound. I didn’t like this product because it was very thin and I wanted something a bit more padded.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha T Wilson

customer_reviews.title: VERY pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: VERY pleased with this. It doesn't have a "plasticky feel" like I was afraid it might. It does have a *very* slight crinkle sound, but I don't notice it on my mattress; it's a little more noticeable when placed on top of the (cushy) foam mattress topper, but even then it's perfectly easy to ignore it (and I can't stand extra little noises at night).
customer_reviews.author: TDH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mattress protector
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous the mistress protector would make too much noise/would be too hot but it’s perfect ! I’ve spilled water on my bed plenty of times and the mattress stays dry. I’ve had this mattress protector for about 4 months now and it’s a great buy for a good price. I don’t get hot from the mattress protector and it doesn’t make a lot of noise when you move around in the bed. I’ve washed it multiple times and just let it air dry and it’s never lost it’s effectiveness. Stains come out easily in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Klutz
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many waterproof pads and this one is the best. I bought this soley on the reviews and am pleasantly surprised. I'm a klutz amd of course spilled juice the first week this was on my bed lol. It worked, did not seep tbrough yay! I also love the fact that when I roll around it doesn't make a plasticy noise. *My package ended up being lost so I bought this from a different place, but still wanted to review this item in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: GrooGrux34

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. It is comfy. Doesn't slide. Didn't make any noises or crinkly sounds. No weird odors. It breathes so you don't get that damp moisture trapping effect. (Years ago I had an old-fashioned vinyl/plastic mattress cover and would wake up in cold sweats that made me suspect malaria, so I sort of resisted this product. Apparently, sleep science has improved since then.)
customer_reviews.author: Pop Bop

customer_reviews.title: Almost can't tell it's there!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we have young kids who sometimes end up in our bed at night. My husband was legitamately surprised when I told him there was a waterproof cover in the bed! Our last one wasn't breathable at all and we both woke up sweaty and unhappy. This one is great! Not terribly crinkly or loud as many covers can be.
customer_reviews.author: Steph J

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress protector!
customer_reviews.text: A must buy if you have a thick mattress. Ours is about 14 to 16 inches thick and this is the best fitting protector we have purchased. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C5 owner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mattress Cover for the Price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress protector because it was recommended by the company we had just bought a mattress from (Leesa). My husband sleeps very "hot" and used to sweat like crazy with our old Tempur-Pedic and it was exacerbated by the Tempur-Pedic brand waterproof cover. I was worried this would have the same problem, but so far, it's been great! I cannot yet vouch for its relative "waterproof-ness" (no pet has puked on this bed yet...), but it sleeps very comfortably and doesn't heat us up. The terry cover is soft and it doesn't feel plastic-y. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Does as it says. No brainier for protecting mattress
customer_reviews.text: This thing is good; when you spend close to 1000$ on a mattress; you should spend this small amount on the protection. I am not sure about the warranty and hardly care about that.(Do not expect a 20+ $ product to refund 1000$). Is it water proof; it sure is. This morning itself it keeps all the stain to itself when accidentally some liquid was spilled. Does it feel fine, yes it does; I do not feel any different which is a good thing. Do not feel like plastic at all. So it does it job and scores well on all the points.
customer_reviews.author: adi_vastava

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof with a great snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and protected the mattress from a couple accidents so far. We have a pillow top king mattress and the fit is perfectly snug. It's not noticeable once you put a sheet in top and doesn't crinkle or have a plastic feel. It washes well and has been a great cover so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this. I haven’t washed it yet so I can’t rate that yet. I bought two to put one on while I wash the other. I have a senior kitty that pees on the bed sometimes. I tested this and poured about a 1/4 cup of water on it and it did not soak thru. The terry cloth top is nice because you don’t sweat like with other products like this. I’ve recommended to my mom and I recommend to anyone with senior animals that may have accidents or people for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgurl915

customer_reviews.title: Sweat, Then Sweat More
customer_reviews.text: If you want to feel like your body is on fire while you sleep and wake up drenched in sweat every morning, this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: The best feature for me is the sides of it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress cover after ours tore apart on the sides. This one seems that it will last way longer. Our mattress is very deep and has an extra pad on top, this cover fits perfectly. The difference with the previous one was the material on the top, the first one being padded, but this one is thinner. Still does what it's supposed to do and doesn't feel hot at all, and doesn't make any noise either. The cover seems to be impermeable but without any plastic in the back. The best feature for me is the sides of it: deep, doesn't move, and looks very resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Catalquezar

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars for sure
customer_reviews.text: This thing has saved my nice king matress from all sorts of stains and liquid from bodily fluids to drinks the twins cough up and spill if you are unsure jist spend the $30-40 and get this. It is not loud at night, it doesn't feel like a plastic pee sheet, (Although it will block pee) it gas a cotton top to it and is machine washable. Do your self a favor a just buy it especially if you have children.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart West

customer_reviews.title: wonderful, non bulky,water rools off!
customer_reviews.text: purchased to help take care of my dad in hospice. Even with incontinence, mattress stayed dry and it was a breeze to wash and dry!
customer_reviews.author: dixie loretta

customer_reviews.title: Firming
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this since my wife is seven months pregnant and hope to protect our mattress should her water break during the night. The top is of a closed loop, similar to terry cloth. This keeps our sheet in place and makes our sheet feel as if it is firmly stretched, therefore firmer feeling. I was concerned before ordering that our sheet would slide on a plastic sheet, but it is cotton on the top side to address that. I wish it wasn't so grabby but it is better than the alternative of sliding over plastic
customer_reviews.author: in.formed

customer_reviews.title: You need this.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I have 3 kids so they were wrecking my mattress. This thing has been a life saver. It does get hot while you sleep, but everything else is as described! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Softest topped mattress protector I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 19” mattress well, appears to be of high quality and out of the MANY mattress protectors I have and have purchased over the years, this one has the softest top and love having it on my bed!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Not really waterproof
customer_reviews.text: My little one ninja’d his way into bed and peed. Great, I had this on. Not great, it didn’t stop any of it. Soaked right through. Maybe because it’s been washed a few times. I had it for 2.5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bed protector
customer_reviews.text: Great product, seems a little big on the king bed though. Would probably fit better maybe if I had a pillowtop because it seems to move around a bit and it seems like it makes you warmer at night. Great quality product overall against spills/liquid and is sturdy even after several washes. I don't dry in the dryer, only air dry to preserve longevity. Only reason I didn't give a 5 star is because it is a little big, but I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt leak!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had a cheap one from Walmart and the sides were running and it wasnt staying on the bed anymore. This one is of much better quality. I tested it with water to see if it would bleed through and it didnt! I have toddlers that climb in bed with us and occasionally diapers leak, so this is a must to protect our memory foam mattress. Im not sure how long it will last, but Im already more impressed with this one than the first one we had.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ward

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give higher rating for sleep quality. However, this cover will make you sweat like you have run a marathon in the depths of a volcano. Great for keeping your mattress dry, I mean it has to considering the amount of perspiration it makes you put off.
customer_reviews.author: Karin K

customer_reviews.title: Great Waterproof Cover
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I had to wash it one time as the cat peed on the bed. I dried on the lowest heat for my dryer and it turned out well. Time will tell if I have any issues as others have mentioned in other reviews. It is much easier to put on the mattress than any previous mattress covers (which were thick and non-waterproof).
customer_reviews.author: Captain Annie

customer_reviews.title: It does the job!
customer_reviews.text: When we bought a king mattress, we had mentioned that getting a mattress protector would be a good idea. Then our new rescue dog decided to pee on the mattress one week after we unboxed it (the mattress, not the dog). One of us promptly got on Amazon and ordered this protector while the other scrubbed at the mattress and sobbed. The dog has peed on the mattress twice since we put the protector on and both times the mattress was unharmed. We've just tossed the protector in the washing machine and put it back on that same night. So yeah, I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Only downside is the annoying scratchy sound it makes when you move around on ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t fork out more $$$ for a protector for my Tempur Pedic Ergo Luxe Cloud Mattress. Figured I’d try this first and see how it goes. It stays on even with the ergo function. Only downside is the annoying scratchy sound it makes when you move around on the bed. That’s because the top is terry cloth. Still thumbs up for me for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far it's waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a week ago along with an expensive down mattress pad. I used this to protect the mattress pad, and over top of this i had a cheap mattress pad. Last night my son, who's potty training, had an accident. Soaked through our blankets, sheets, and cheap mattress pad, soaked the top of this product, but when I pulled this off, underneath wasn't wet, just cold and my expensive down is safe!!! So at least for the first time, it's waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Fallingrace67

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: So far we haven't had to use it for water resistance. It has deep pockets so it covers our mattress really well. I really like this and I think it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: An excellent purchase to protect an investment!
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent purchase. We wanted to protect our new mattress because our dog likes to sleep on the bed and she has had 1-2 "accidents" in the past. We bought a waterproof cover at Bed Bath and Beyond for about $30 and we couldn't get any sleep at all because it was like sleeping on a garbage bag. It was so loud! We sleep just fine with this waterproof cover. It is easy to put on and remove for washing. We give it a perfect 5 star rating!
customer_reviews.author: eehno65

customer_reviews.title: Yuck! Loud and crunchy.
customer_reviews.text: This product made me crunches. The material would be like sleeping on a crumply diaper - made noise and had a crunchy texture to it. White top but off-white mesh sides. Aaannd it came with a small stain on it. Returning!
customer_reviews.author: T A S

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Not crunchy sounding. Fits great, I don’t have any problem with it sliding off the bed. It has been tested and washed three times after pee accidents and drink spilling. It did not leak through.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protection!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we bought, we have a different size bed. It’s an excellent way to Protects your mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Goldstein Class Wish List

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Item works very well, no issues with it being too hot to sleep on or making noises while sleeping on top of it. Had protected the mattress from the time my husband didn't realized he had cut himself and bled on the bed sheet and it went onto the mattress protector and it stopped it from getting onto the mattress. Well worth the money and less expensive from what I've seen in the stores. Would buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Music & Book Fan

customer_reviews.title: Never had a mattress topper before but appears to get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it’s water resistance as I just put it on my mattress last night, but cleaning should be a simple throw in the washer type of deal. It’s easy to put on with no struggle like some sheets are, so that’s nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Heavy mattress, need two people set it in frame.
customer_reviews.text: A great mattress, priced nice! Pay no attention to consumers stating you feel as though you are sinking. The mattress is plushly firm, for normal sized adults. You will be pleased. I had a linespa 12inch and upgraded to the 16inch. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job but...
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick for being waterproof (so far) but makes the bed much warmer and a bit less comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered and received my 2nd mattress pad; not that there was anything wrong with the 1st one....but now I have a puppy who sleeps with me. Need I say more? Sometimes I don't get a chance to do a load of laundry and wanted a back-up. The 1st one has been washed countless times and has held up. This pad has survived the challenges of a puppy and has kept the mattress completely dry. Also, I think the price is very goof for this pad.
customer_reviews.author: T-Wood class of 91

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: You can tell there is plastic on the bed when this is on. I’ll use it, but I’m would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. My son had an accident in our bed and it didn’t make it to the brand new mattress. The only downside is it makes me sweat idk it could just be me lol. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love this cover very easy to use and even if my son sets the bed it don’t stain the fabric will certainly buy again
customer_reviews.author: ALLOY ABASALI

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheap but I’m not sleeping directly on it. It’s also large for the bed (king size with 5 inch topper and feather bed), but it gets the job done and keeps liquids and stains from getting on my feather bed. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ivana Cherie

customer_reviews.title: WATER RESISTANCE
customer_reviews.text: WE have quite a few cats so we wanted to protect our mattress. It's soft and easy to wash comes out nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: joanne t. appel

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. I don’t care leave bad reviews but this Leaves me no choice. Mattress cover did not survive one washing, It got a huge tear down the center. I spent a little bit more money and bought a mattress protector from bed gear well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Baby Proof
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our adult king size bed as our 15 month old daughter sleeps with us some nights and she sometimes leaks through her diaper. First night we used it she managed to wiggle almost OUT of her diaper and peed the bed. This protector was 100% leakproof on going through to the mattress underneath. I was amazed and very pleased. I definatly give this product a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Mfairy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protector
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I got. I change it every two years and wash it weekly. Very Good quality, will keep buying this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: definitely water proof
customer_reviews.text: By far the best bed protector yet. It's waterproof, but doesn't make those weird diaper noises while laying on it. it also doesn't make the sheets pop off. All around the best bed cover.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Fox

customer_reviews.title: Goodproduct
customer_reviews.text: I wish it went all the way around the mattress. Fits like a fitted sheet. Wewere able to fit our 10 inch mattress plus our 4 inch mattress topper under it. It does not slide off or move at all. I have not experience any of the crinkle sound that other reviewers mentioned
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Slides all over the place
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new king size mattress not realizing that it is fitted sheet-like, not envelope-like. It bunches up and slides all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: T.Ray

customer_reviews.title: soaked through
customer_reviews.text: started to soak through after the 2nd year, followed washing instructions on every wash
customer_reviews.author: USER2020

customer_reviews.title: thin, cheap, plastic
customer_reviews.text: not sure about everyone else but I feel like this mattress protector is too thin and the plastic layer really comes through, giving the whole thing a very cheap feel, and as you roll around it does have a very plastic-y sound to it as well. I guess they make it really thin to be breatheable, which is good, but overall it will still make you feel like you are sleeping on plastic. There are other, better made protectors that cost more that do not have a plastic texture or sound. Pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Silent and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I have a 3 year old that comes to my bed every night. He hasn't had an accident in a long time now, but I don't want to take any chances! Mattresses are expensive! This thing isn't loud, or too hot. The top is a terry type of fabric, so it isn't like sleeping on a garbage bag either. I expect it will last us a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: Saved my mattress
customer_reviews.text: The top material feels like a rough towel but after the first wash it softens. I don’t recommend sleeping on this but it’s lightweight doesn’t add extra heat and gets the job done. Plus deep pockets are a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: ashlee sandvoss

customer_reviews.title: Like being swallowed up in quicksand!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. The moment I laid down on it I sank down in it and could not move. it was like being swallowed up in quicksand. This mattress topper was a complete waste of money. Ended up in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie  AZ

customer_reviews.title: Fits bed even with thick mattress and 4in topper
customer_reviews.text: Have not had any spills of anything just got ot for extra protection
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Kind of feels plasticky.
customer_reviews.text: Any non-zippered protector only protects against water. The fitted sheet style ones dont protect against critters. (Bedbugs, etc). Pretty plastic feeling too.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't effect matress feel
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to find out if water resistance works yet, but it doesn't effect the matress' feel.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Up until the last time I washed this, I ...
customer_reviews.text: Up until the last time I washed this, I would have five it a five star but then I washed and dried it the way I always have and it came out of the dryer melted together. I have five of these mattress covers for various size beds and haven’t had an issue with any of them except this one. Now I have a mattress cover I can no longer use because the waterproofing melted together and no longer fits my bed. Looking for a new mattress cover that won’t melt together.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Used exactly 2 nights first wash it literally explosed all its dryer beads all over inside of washer. Cant possibly return it because its totally soaked and prob weighs 30 pounds. Not at all happy threw in garbage can now to try and clean up mess!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Upon receipt, I washed it as indicated and the water sheeted right off, after I placed in the the rinse cycle for a 2nd time. I dried it as indicated and it went on my king size memory foam mattress, also bought on Amazon, and it fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: It might be my imagination, but I swear I ...
customer_reviews.text: It might be my imagination, but I swear I can feel the terrycloth through my sheets. It took a few days to get used to, but now I don't really notice it. If you're sensitive to textures, but something else! So far the water proofing has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Saved our bed more than once! I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Charles Lindsey Ginter Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your lucid mattress
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and mattress protector for our lucid mattress. Easy to clean and is quiet (doesn’t make noise like other mattress protectors).
customer_reviews.author: hauwij06

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mattress Protector!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover is great! I always thought mattress covers were for children's mattresses to protect against nighttime accidents, but I thought I would give this a try since we spent a lot on our mattress, and I wanted to have something to protect it.. It's quiet, cool, and after doing a few little tests, it really does protect against liquids! This was the first mattress protector I've tried, but I was really happy with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: We like the cover so far. Got it since I'm 39 weeks pregnant and really don't want to ruin mattress if water breaks! It isn't loud or sound like plastic so that is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Lara

customer_reviews.title: Holds heat and does not breathe - Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This product does not breathe. It holds heat and makes sleep impossible. Both my husband and I woke up sweat covered and miserable despite AC and fan on, and only a sheet.Tried item for 3 nights, same each night. I am sending this back as soon as possible. Disappointed that Amazon had this as a recommended/suggested buy.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Very good mattress protector!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector is very nice and fits our king mattress very well. We also have a 2" mattress topper on and this had no problem with that as well. Would purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Looney

customer_reviews.title: it can't be 100% waterproof
customer_reviews.text: My son was wetting the bed last night.this one can't be 100% waterproof.the mattress was a little wet.but the softness is good for me.
customer_reviews.author: シュエ

customer_reviews.title: After a year and many washes, this protector no longer holds liquid.
customer_reviews.text: Any liquid pretty much seeps into the cover and wets the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Buatkokk

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This cover is exactly what I needed for my mattress topper. Some wrinkles here and there but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Bought it as a replacement for a previous cover and this one is 10x better! This covers our 12" mattress 100%. The last cover was rough and basically like a piece plastic. This is so soft and we happened to have an accident a few weeks ago, Nothing got to our mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Please use a sheet on top of this. Fits twin bed fine. Not great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Gralnik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Necessary if you dont want to void your warranty on your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quiet Mattress Protector!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bit nervous when I opened the package and you can hear the crinkle sound of the waterproof backing. I did NOT want to hear anything when moving in bed. We put it on and it's been COMPLETELY SILENT. I wouldn't even know it's there (had I not put it on). I have not had to test the waterproof feature yet but so far I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: Fits tight for a smooth top on my mattress. Comfortable to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: mdgarnett

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof. Goes through to mattress, so don't risk it if you have a warranty on your mattress. If these fail on you, you break your warranty. It's worth paying more to get ones that actually work.
customer_reviews.author: JBB

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to protect our new mattress. We have a king size 12 in deep mattress and it fits perfectly !! It doesn't slide off and you don't have to keep tugging the corners or edges down. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very soft material and fit my king size bed (with an extra topper) perfectly. No crunchy sound once I put it on but I did prewash it and let it air dry. Right after I had put it on my baby threw up on the sheets, nothing soaked through the protector so already doing its job on day one.
customer_reviews.author: Stafford family

customer_reviews.title: Highly water proof
customer_reviews.text: This has a great water barrier. We have a cat who has been urinating on our bed and this has kept it from going through to the mattress. It's a very thin layer, so it's not very noticeable when you sleep, but it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Tralee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your life!
customer_reviews.text: I literally gave birth on this thing and not a drop of blood went through! We immediately bought a second one of these because we knew it could hold up against 2 dogs and a baby! We have gotten our money's worth from this product and then some. I always recommend this to people buying a new mattress and especially to new moms. I can't tell you how much this has saved our mattress! It does NOT have a crinkly plastic sound when you lay on it. It's thin, effective, and easily washable. Hailey
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This cover works amazing! We have five dogs who like to randomly ...
customer_reviews.text: This cover works amazing! We have five dogs who like to randomly sleep on our bed and this cover has has protected our mattress for the last six months. I think everyone should own one of these considering you have kids , Dogs, cats or people sleeping in your bed. It's waterproof, sweat proof, dander, dirt and anything you bring to bed with you. We wash it once a week with our sheets and it's just as easy as putting the sheets on! I will buy these for all of our beds
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: Makes feel cool .
customer_reviews.text: I afraid to ordered this low price than other item . But it's cool. Quality isn't good but at least I don't have to feel hot and also not use waterproof pad under the bed cover anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny day

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 12" king sized Lucid mattress. It's madr of great material and was deep pocketed so it fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job!
customer_reviews.text: This product has saved my mattress topper a couple times. It is very thin but the membrane prevents any liquid from penetrating. Highly recommended. Easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: William H Barnes Jr

product_meta.title: LUCID MALOUF Protector, King
product_meta.description: Size:King| Style:Cotton Terry TopSoft, quiet protection this soft, quiet mattress protector is made from quiet, ultra-thin material that is breathable and maintains a comfortable sleeping temperature. The LUCID mattress protector has a cozy Terry fabric top surface that does not change the feel or sound of the mattress while providing excellent top-of-mattress protection against liquids, dust mites and allergens. 100 percent waterproof barrier a thin, quiet polyurethane membrane repels liquids and fluids to protect your mattress and your mattress warranty from stains. Made of safe materials, this protector is safe for children and pets. This liquid-proof barrier has tiny pores that allow air to pass for breathability and a comfortable sleep temperature. Do away with dust mites every night your body sheds millions of skin flakes and loses up to one liter of body fluid through your pores and mouth. Because they survive on dead skin cells and bodily fluids, up to 2 million dust mites can live in your unprotected mattress. Exposure to dust mites has been linked to the development of asthma in young children. Additionally, dust mites have been shown to be a leading cause of allergies and eczema. LUCID mattress protectors cut off the food supply to dust mites, making it impossible for them to survive. Deep pocket design fitted sheet-style mattress protector has a fully-elasticized skirt and deep pockets that keeps the protector tightly in place on mattresses depths up to 22 inches. Easy to put on and take off for laundering, this protector works great on extra-thick memory foam and pillow top mattresses. Machine washable keep your mattress clean and fresh by washing your sleep surface. Machine wash hot water. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach, iron or dry clean.
feature_bullets: 100% Waterproof - repels all liquids including bodily fluids, perspiration, urine and accidental spills - machine washable protection
Noiseless and comfortable hypoallergenic cotton terry surface and polyurethane backing inhibits allergy-causing dust mites and bacteria from living in your mattress - safe for children and pets
Fully-elasticized fitted sheet style with deep pockets designed to fit mattresses up to 22 inches deep
Ultra-Thin design is breathable, quiet and sleeps cool without changing the feel of your mattress
King size protector measures 78 x 80; 15-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,510 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
